about_the_game:
Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm, is a game of connecting cultures, which takes you back to the height of one of the greatest Mayan civilizations.

Be a historian lost in this culture, and enjoy all that this “new world” can offer you. Inserting yourself in a culture that you only know from old books is not easy, so do your part, train with the weapons of the time and prove yourself as a brave warrior, help in hunting and fishing, finding unusual challenges, quests for local natives, explore! Everything around you is a little mystical so adventure yourself out and you will be well rewarded. Be challenged by ancient gods. Each encounter with these mythological beings unlocks powers that help you on your journey, both in combat and exploration.

All your training, effort and experiences will show you the path of your evolution, become stronger and dive headfirst into this incredible civilization.

Walk the story to become a legend meet the Gods.
detailed_description:
Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm, is a game of connecting cultures, which takes you back to the height of one of the greatest Mayan civilizations.

Be a historian lost in this culture, and enjoy all that this “new world” can offer you. Inserting yourself in a culture that you only know from old books is not easy, so do your part, train with the weapons of the time and prove yourself as a brave warrior, help in hunting and fishing, finding unusual challenges, quests for local natives, explore! Everything around you is a little mystical so adventure yourself out and you will be well rewarded. Be challenged by ancient gods. Each encounter with these mythological beings unlocks powers that help you on your journey, both in combat and exploration.

All your training, effort and experiences will show you the path of your evolution, become stronger and dive headfirst into this incredible civilization.

Walk the story to become a legend meet the Gods.
name: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 bits
  • Sound Card: NA
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm, is an action-adventure game that takes you to the height of one of the greatest Mayan civilizations. Become a legendary warrior of Tikal, train with the army of the time, explore mystical places of this mythology and finally, acquire the powers of the ancient gods.
supported_languages:
Portuguese - Brazil*, English
*languages with full audio support
